com.hush.pgp.io
Class ArmorInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      com.hush.pgp.io.ArmorInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
PgpConstants, java.io.Closeable
public class ArmorInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
implements PgpConstants

Interprets the ASCII wrapper of a PGP message. If the message type is thePgpSignedMessage, -1 will be returned after the plain text is read. Upon resuming read, the signature bytes will be read. This means that a stream containing a PGP Signed Message has EOF's.
